entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Pembroke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:18 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 01:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Snow with ice pellets in the afternoon and with freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to rain in the evening then to flurries overnight. Fog patches late in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
